sectionType._instruction: Add the type of this live paper section: one of 'custom', 'generic', 'models', 'morphology', 'traces'

order._instruction: Enter the order in which this section should appear.

name._instruction: Enter a title for this section.

description._instruction: Enter a textual description of the section contents.

isPartOf._instruction: Enter the live paper version this section is part of.
